## LiquidationDetails interface

Details of a [liquidate()](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.liquidate.md) or [liquidateUpTo()](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.liquidateupto.md) transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LiquidationDetails 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bpdGasCompensation](./lib-base.liquidationdetails.bpdgascompensation.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of BPD paid to the liquidator as gas compensation. |
|  [collateralGasCompensation](./lib-base.liquidationdetails.collateralgascompensation.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of native currency (e.g. Ether) paid to the liquidator as gas compensation. |
|  [liquidatedAddresses](./lib-base.liquidationdetails.liquidatedaddresses.md) | string\[\] | Addresses whose Vaults were liquidated by the transaction. |
|  [totalLiquidated](./lib-base.liquidationdetails.totalliquidated.md) | [Vault](./lib-base.vault.md) | Total collateral liquidated and debt cleared by the transaction. |
